roleset.name: create/install/develop into canals, surgically or otherwise

role.descr: Entity canals are created in, patient

example.name: canalize-v
example.text: ...the travertine embankment walls of the late 19th century effectively canalized the whole Tiber much as the Cloaca canalized the forum stream...
example.arg: the travertine embankment walls of the late 19th century
much as the Cloaca canalized the forum stream

example.name: canalize-v
example.text: I immediately canalized the patient and began a drip of normal saline solution to increase his blood volume.

example.name: canalization-n
example.text: C. H. Waddington inferred developmental canalization of gene expression by noting that differentiation leads to the formation of discrete types of tissue...
